name: BGNlive
title: Streaming Live with BGN

description_panels.body:
Hello hello! :) Welcome to my stream channel!

On this stream we'll be working on both commissioned work and personal work. Most of the work you see here will be anthro/furry themed, and often will include Mature Content. *Viewer discretion is advised!*

Thank you for joining us! :) Hope you enjoy the stream!

**Chat Rules:**

- Please be kind and courteous to others.
- No RPing (role playing) in the chat.
- You are welcome to discuss and talk about what you like, but please keep it civil and professional. No arguing or lashing out at others.
- If you are disruptive or rude to others, I will ask you to leave.

**Posting Links:**

- You may post links
- Please keep it to a minimum. Do not spam the chat with links.
- Please also note that I may not view them. If it's something important, I will. If not, I will pass on it, or view it at a later time. 


**Regarding commissions:**

- No commission spots are available during the stream. 
- All commissions are booked in advanced -- See below for details!
 
- To find out more about stream commissions, visit https://bgnartwork.com/commissions

- If you have any questions about commissions, just let me know! ;)

For commission information, visit:
https://bgnartwork.com/commissions

You can also email me at: bgnartwork@gmail.com

You can also follow me on:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/84elcamino
Tumblr: http://blueguynow.tumblr.com/
FurAffinity: http://www.furaffinity.net/user/bgn
DeviantART: http://blueguynow.deviantart.com/

private_message: You need the private key to view this stream
